footer.tagline: Device Passport Traceability System - Full Lifecycle Equipment Management

registration.title: Create Your Account
registration.subtitle: Choose how you want to join the Device Passport System

businessLicense.title: Business License Information
businessLicense.subtitle: Provide your company details and upload your business license.

company.title: Company Information
company.name: Company Name
company.codeUsage: Used in device passport codes (e.g., DP-ABC-2025-...)
company.businessScopePlaceholder: Describe your company's main business activities...

address.fullAddressPlaceholder: Enter complete registered address including street, city, state/province, postal code, and country
address.businessAddressPlaceholder: Enter business address or select on map

documents.businessLicenseHint: Upload your business license (PDF or image, max 10MB)

success.title: Registration Submitted!
success.message: Your application has been submitted for review.
success.checkEmail: We've sent a confirmation email with your registration details.
success.approvalPending: Our team will review your application. This usually takes 1-2 business days.

pending.title: Pending Registrations
pending.description: Review and approve new company and expert registrations

supplier.title: Supplier Products
supplier.subtitle: Add the products your company supplies. You can add more products after registration.
supplier.noProductsHint: Click "Add Product" to add your first product
supplier.tipText: Adding detailed product information helps buyers find your products more easily. Include HS codes for international trade compliance.
supplier.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?

buyer.title: Buyer Requirements
buyer.subtitle: Tell us about your purchasing needs so we can match you with suitable suppliers.
buyer.specificationsPlaceholder: Describe specifications, brand preferences, or other requirements...
buyer.noProductsHint: Click "Add Product" to specify what you're looking to purchase
buyer.generalDescriptionPlaceholder: Any additional information about your purchasing needs, preferred brands, quality standards, etc.
buyer.attachmentsHelp: PDF, Word, Excel, Images, DWG (max 10MB each)
buyer.paymentTermsPlaceholder: e.g., Net 30, LC at sight, 30% advance + 70% before shipment
buyer.infoText: Your purchasing requirements help us recommend suitable suppliers and products. This information is shared with potential suppliers to facilitate better matches.
buyer.title: Buyer Information

review.title: Review Your Registration
review.subtitle: Please review your information before submitting. You can go back to make changes.
review.name: Name
review.step1: Your registration will be submitted for review
review.step2: Our team will verify your information
review.step3: You'll receive an email once your account is approved
review.step4: You can log in immediately, but some features will be limited until approval

expertType.title: Choose Your Expert Type
expertType.subtitle: Select one or more categories that best describe your expertise and services. You can select both if applicable.
expertType.selectHint: Please select at least one expert type to continue.
expertType.bothSelected: Great! You've selected both expert types. This allows you to offer a wider range of services.

technical.name: Technical Expert
technical.description: Engineers, technicians, and specialists who provide hands-on technical services, installation, maintenance, and repairs.

business.name: Business Expert
business.description: Consultants and advisors who provide business strategy, sourcing, and commercial services.

expertPersonal.title: Personal Information
expertPersonal.subtitle: Provide your personal and emergency contact information.
expertPersonal.privacyText: Your personal information is securely stored and only shared with clients when you accept a service assignment. Emergency contact details are kept strictly confidential.

professional.title: Professional Information
professional.subtitle: Tell us about your professional background and expertise.
professional.servicesPlaceholder: Describe the services you can provide, your specializations, and areas of expertise...
professional.servicesHint: Be specific about your capabilities to help clients find you
professional.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe your responsibilities and achievements...
professional.noWorkHint: Adding work history helps build trust with potential clients
professional.tip2: Mention specific equipment brands you're experienced with
professional.tip3: Highlight any specialized training or courses
professional.tip4: Be clear about your service coverage area

documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Upload your documents to complete your profile. These help verify your identity and qualifications.
documents.photoHint: A clear photo of yourself (JPEG or PNG, max 5MB)
documents.idDocumentHint: A scan or photo of your ID card or passport (PDF or image, max 10MB)
documents.idNote: Your ID document will be used for verification purposes only and stored securely.
documents.resumeHint: Upload your resume in PDF or Word format (max 10MB)
documents.certificatesHint: Upload certificates, licenses, or credential documents (up to 5 files)
documents.tip1: Ensure your resume is up-to-date with recent experience
documents.tip2: Include certificates for specific equipment brands or technologies
documents.tip3: Professional licenses and safety certifications are highly valued
documents.tip4: Documents will be verified during the approval process
documents.tip5: Use clear, high-quality scans or photos for ID documents
documents.passportInfoText: Upon approval, you will receive a unique Personal Digital Passport code in the format:

expertReview.title: Review Your Registration
expertReview.subtitle: Please review your information before submitting. You can go back to make changes.
expertReview.step1: Your registration will be submitted for review
expertReview.step2: Our team will verify your credentials and documents
expertReview.step3: You'll receive an email once your account is approved
expertReview.step4: After approval, you'll receive your Personal Digital Passport and can start receiving service assignments

passport.title: Device Passports
passport.description: Manage device passports and their lifecycle
passport.createDescription: Enter device information to generate a new passport

home.heroSubtitle: Full lifecycle management for electromechanical automation equipment. Scan, verify, and track your devices with confidence.
home.featuresSubtitle: From procurement to service, every step is tracked and verified.
home.feature1Desc: Every device gets a unique digital passport with full lifecycle tracking.
home.feature2Desc: Verify device authenticity instantly by scanning the QR code.
home.feature3Desc: Track device history from procurement to service, every step recorded.
home.feature4Desc: Request service and track maintenance history for your equipment.
home.statusSubtitle: Track your device through every stage
home.ctaSubtitle: Scan a device QR code to verify its authenticity and view its complete history.

scan.title: Scan Device Passport
scan.subtitle: Enter the device passport code to view its information and history

serviceRequest.title: Service Request
serviceRequest.subtitle: Fill out the form below to request service
serviceRequest.description: Submit a service request for your device
serviceRequest.hasPassport: I have a device passport number
serviceRequest.hasPassportHint: If you have a device passport code, we can match your device information automatically
serviceRequest.submittedMessage: We have received your service request. Our team will contact you shortly.
serviceRequest.noPassportCode: I don't have a Device Passport Code
serviceRequest.passportCodeHelp: Enter your device passport code for faster service
serviceRequest.passportRequired: Device passport code is required for this service type
serviceRequest.materialsProvided: Materials will be provided by customer
serviceRequest.descriptionPlaceholder: Detailed description of the issue or service needed
serviceRequest.attachmentsHelp: Upload photos or documents to help describe the issue (max 10MB each)
serviceRequest.locationHelp: Click on the map to select your service location for precise positioning
serviceRequest.mapPlaceholder: Click to select location on map
serviceRequest.addressHelp: You can also select a location on the map above to auto-fill this field

deviceTakeover.title: Register Device
deviceTakeover.subtitle: Register your existing device to get a digital passport
deviceTakeover.description: Manage third-party device takeover requests and passport generation
deviceTakeover.infoText: Device registration allows you to add your existing equipment to our platform. After review and approval, we will generate a digital passport with a unique QR code for your device, enabling full lifecycle tracking and service management.
deviceTakeover.devicePhotosHint: Upload clear photos showing the entire device from multiple angles
deviceTakeover.nameplatePhotosHint: Upload clear photos of the device nameplate showing model and serial number
deviceTakeover.documentsHint: Upload purchase receipts, manuals, or other supporting documents
deviceTakeover.photoRequired: Please upload at least one device photo
deviceTakeover.nameplateRequired: Please upload at least one nameplate photo
deviceTakeover.reasonDescriptionPlaceholder: Provide any additional information about why you want to register this device...
deviceTakeover.notesPlaceholder: Any other information you want to share...
deviceTakeover.submittedMessage: Your device registration request has been submitted. Our team will review the information and contact you within 2-3 business days.
deviceTakeover.searchRequests: Search by code, device, or customer...
deviceTakeover.approveConfirm: This will generate a device passport for the customer.
